#summary How to develop for CSPoker
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =
So you want to contribute? These guides might make it easier if you're willing to use the the supported tool set.

= Guides =
 * The [SubversionGuide Subversion guide] explains how to download the source code and send it back to us.
 * The [MavenGuide Maven guide] explains how to compile the source code from the command line, run tests and package a release.
 * The [EclipseGuide Eclipse guide] explains how you can automatically import all the CSPoker (sub-)projects in Eclipse and configure the dependencies correctly.

= Documentation =
The [API API documentation] explains the client-server interface. 

= To Do =
The [http://code.google.com/p/cspoker/issues/list bug tracker] always contains work that needs to be done. For more general projects, you can find inspiration on the [Ideas ideas page].
